00028 ProgParameter::ProgParameter()
00029 {
00030     needed() = true;
00031     hidden() = false;
00032 }
00033 ProgParameter::ProgParameter( const ProgParameter &ref ): PropertyValue( static_cast<const PropertyValue &>( ref ) ), m_hidden( false ) {}

00036 {
00037     return m_hidden;

00043 
00044 bool ProgParameter::parse( const Type<std::string> &props )
00045 {
00046     _internal::TypeBase &me = **this;
00047     bool ret = false;
00048 
00049     if ( ( ( std::string )props ).empty() ) {
00050         if ( me.is<bool>() ) {
00051             me.cast_to<bool>() = true;
00052             ret = true;
00053         }
00054     } else {
00055         ret = _internal::TypeBase::convert( props, me );
00056     }
00057 
00058     LOG_IF( ret, Debug, info ) << "Parsed " << MSubject( props.toString() ) << " as " << me.toString( true );
00059 
00060     if( ret )m_set = true;
00061 
00062     return ret;
00063 }
00064 const std::string &ProgParameter::description()const
00065 {
00066     return m_description;
00067 }
00068 void ProgParameter::setDescription( const std::string &desc )
00069 {
00070     m_description = desc;
00071 }
00072 bool ProgParameter::isSet() const
00073 {
00074     return m_set;
00075 }

00077 
00078 ParameterMap::ParameterMap(): parsed( false ) {}
00079 
00080 bool ParameterMap::parse( int argc, char **argv )
00081 {
00082     parsed = true;
00083     std::string pName;
00084 
00085     for ( int i = 1; i < argc; ) { // scan through the command line, to find next parameter
00086         if ( argv[i][0] == '-' ) { //seems like we found a new parameter here
00087             pName = argv[i];
00088             pName.erase( 0, pName.find_first_not_of( '-' ) );
00089         } else {
00090             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Ignoring unexpected non-parameter " << MSubject( argv[i] );
00091         }
00092 
00093         i++;
00094 
00095         if( !pName.empty() ) { // if we got a parameter before
00096             const int begin = i;
00097 
00098             while( i < argc && argv[i][0] != '-' ) { //collect its properties, while there are some ..
00099                 i++;
00100             }
00101 
00102             iterator found = find( pName );
00103 
00104             if( found == end() ) {
00105                 LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Ignoring unknown parameter " << MSubject( std::string( "-" ) + pName + " " + list2string( argv + begin, argv + i, " ", "", "" ) );
00106             } else if ( found->second.parse( list2string( argv + begin, argv + i, ",", "", "" ) ) ) { // parse the collected properties
00107                 found->second.needed() = false;//remove needed flag, because the value is set (aka "not needed anymore")
00108             } else {
00109                 LOG( Runtime, error )
00110                         << "Failed to parse value(s) "
00111                         << MSubject( list2string( argv + begin, argv + i, " ", "", "" ) )
00112                         << " for "  << found->first << "(" << found->second->typeName() << ")";
00113                 parsed = false;
00114             }
00115         }
00116     }
00117 
00118     return parsed ;
00119 }
00120 bool ParameterMap::isComplete()const
00121 {
00122     LOG_IF( ! parsed, Debug, error ) << "You did not run parse() yet. This is very likely an error";
00123     return std::find_if( begin(), end(), neededP() ) == end();
00124 }
00125 
00126 ProgParameter::operator boost::scoped_ptr<_internal::TypeBase>::unspecified_bool_type()const
00127 {
00128     boost::scoped_ptr<_internal::TypeBase> dummy;
00129 
00130     if( ( *this )->cast_to<bool>() )dummy.reset( new Type<int16_t> );
00131 
00132     return  dummy;
00133 }
